content: Roadmap  • Warmup: predictive OLS regressions of economic activity on changes  in credit spreads and stock returns (1929-2013).  • Regressions of economic activity on changes in credit spreads and stock  returns due to changes in market sentiment:  (a) Baseline results (1929-2013). (b) Robustness: different subsamples/horizons and activity measures. (c) Additional measures of credit-market sentiment. (d) Controlling for leverage and credit growth.  • Inspecting the mechanism: (a) A simple model. (b) Evidence on the mechanism: response of financing mix and investment to   changes in credit-market sentiment.  • Policy implications.
